Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; The list of department-approved supporting courses can be found at: https://arts.psu.edu/degrees/theatre-minor (please scroll to bottom of page)

Course_Title: Select 15 credits of THEA, DANCE, or courses from the approved list. A minimum of 6 credits from the 15 must be at the 400 level.
